nodes.text: The Fountain was an ancient and mysterious device located on the planet Aleen. Based on Force-inspired technology, the Fountain was a massive jet of water which could erupt from the Underworld and transport anyone caught in the stream up to the surface world. Water from the stream was collected by an agent working for the Chancellor of the Republic for nefarious purposes. This dram was retrieved by the Aleena before the agent could take it offworld, worshiping it as they worshiped the strange being, Orphne.
